entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
